pages.text: Drain the life from nature itself to sustain your own. This toggleable sigil automatically consumes plant matter from your inventory or the world to restore hunger.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)LP Cost:$() 5 LP per consumption$(br2)$(bold)Activation:$() Sneak + right-click to toggle on/off$(br2)When active and you can eat:$(li)Consumes plants from inventory first$(li)Then scans nearby blocks (8 block range by default)$(li)Destroys consumable blocks$(li)Restores 1-3 hunger + saturation

pages.title: Details
pages.text: $(bold)Consumable Blocks:$()$(li)Logs, leaves, saplings$(li)Flowers, crops, grass$(li)Kelp, seagrass, vines$(li)Most bonemealable plants$(br2)$(bold)Will Generation:$() Generates $(will)Corrosive Will$() (0.3-0.8 per block) in the chunk.$(br2)$(italic)The hungry mage need never farm again.$()
